DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether treatment with quetiapine XR (Seroquel XR) tablets for 3 weeks will improve their agitation when they have acute psychosis.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of SEROQUEL Extended Release (XR) in Acute Schizophrenia
